section.name: Latest Release
section.note:
SignServer 3.5.0 is now available for download from SourceForge.
SHA1 checksums:
-REPLACE-WITH-CHECKSUM- signserver-3.5.0.zip -REPLACE-WITH-CHECKSUM- signserver-3.5.0-bin.zip -REPLACE-WITH-CHECKSUM- signserver-3.5.0-src.tar.gz

section.name: Main source packages
section.p: Download any of the source packages from SourceForge.

section.name: Live CD
section.p: Get up and running quicker by downloading and running our LiveCD. It contains a (old) sample installation of SignServer and also EJBCA.
Requires atleast 1512 MB of memory to run. Please see wiki.ejbca.org/livecd for all information.
